mapper.select: SELECT s.email, s.game_no, s.total, s.lose, s.win, s.disconnect, s.point, u.nickname FROM score s INNER JOIN user u ON s.email = u.email ORDER BY point DESC
SELECT * FROM score WHERE email=#{email} AND game_no=#{gameNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score (email, total, win, lose, disconnect, game_no, point) values(#{email}, #{total}, #{win}, #{lose}, #{disconnect}, #{game_no}, #{point})
mapper.update: UPDATE score SET email = #{email}, total = #{total}, lose = #{lose}, disconnect = #{disconnect}, game_no = #{gameNo}, point = #{point} WHERE email = #{email}
